alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 9:22PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Sullivan County through 1000 PM EDT... At 922 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Neversink to Hartwood. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fallsburg, Monticello, Liberty, Neversink, South Fallsburg, Wurtsboro, Woodridge, Bloomingburg, Haven and Phillipsport. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 99 and 114. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
